did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
Arbitration hearing before Albert I. Cornsweet, Chairman, Phillip B. Willauer and Hyman G. Gould in Rochester, New York from June 20, 1950 to June 29, 1950. The issues were:
1. Ability to pay.
2. Hourly wage rates.
3. Arbitration.
4. Hours.
5. Extra men.
6. Overtime.
7. Retroactivity.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Arbitration hearing before Albert I. Cornsweet, Chairman, Phillip B. Willauer and Hyman G. Gould in Rochester, New York from June 20, 1950 to June 29, 1950. The issues were:
The collection is arranged in four series: Transcripts, Union Exhibits, Company Exhibits, and Award.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Rochester Transit Company Arbitration Files #5104. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
